ingredients.item: 1 tbsp fat-free Greek style natural yogurt
1 fillet from a 380g pack Waitrose Frozen Mackerel Fillets
1 slice Village Bakery Try Rye! Seeded Organic Rye Bread, about 40g

instructions.step: Combine the yogurt and parsley in a small bowl with a little seasoning. Combine the vinegar, honey and caraway seeds in a larger bowl.
Cut away the thick stalks from the greens, roll them up and finely shred. Add to a pan of boiling water with the shallot and cook for 2 minutes. Drain well and stir into the caraway dressing.
Preheat the grill and cook the mackerel for 10 minutes, turning once until cooked through. Toast the bread and place on a serving plate with the greens and mackerel. Spoon the parsley yogurt on top.
